name: Sheltering Boughs
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Sheltering Boughs enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
flavor_text:
"We're not at odds with the woods. How could we be, when we share so many enemies?"
—Marel, Dawnhart witch

name: Snarling Wolf
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Snarling Wolf gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Oh, thank the angels. It's not a werewolf, just a regular wo—"
—Bruno, Ulvenwald guide, last words

name: Spore Crawler
oracle_text: When Spore Crawler dies, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Remember to come back in a few years when that fungus has died off. Then we'll see what's in the chest."
—Old Rutstein

name: Sporeback Wolf
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Sporeback Wolf gets +0/+2.
flavor_text: The mushrooms growing in the wolves' fur possess curative properties incredible enough to tempt many alchemists risking into their lives to track one down.

name: Toxic Scorpion
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Toxic Scorpion enters the battlefield, another target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"You want that venom? Collect it yourself! I'm not losing another pair of dragonhide gloves."
—Old Rustein

name: Wolf Strike
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn if it's night. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text: Tovolar's howlpack had scattered, but the Dire-Strain survivors were still on the hunt.

name: Witch's Web
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor_text: Ever since the ritual, Ryla didn't have an appetite at the dinner table, but her long walks in the forest always seemed to satiate her hunger.

name: Blood Servitor
oracle_text: When Blood Servitor enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text:
"Please, my friends, help yourself to the help."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Ceremonial Knife
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, create a Blood token." (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Lantern of the Lost
oracle_text:
When Lantern of the Lost enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.
{1}, {T}, Exile Lantern of the Lost: Exile all cards from all graveyards, then draw a card.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"Spend too much time scanning the shadows for evil and you'll never see the beauty our world has to offer."
—Katilda, Dawnhart Prime

name: Panicked Bystander // Cackling Culprit
type_line: Creature — Human Peasant // Creature — Human Rogue

card_faces.name: Panicked Bystander
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever Panicked Bystander or another creature you control dies, you gain 1 life.
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, transform Panicked Bystander.

card_faces.name: Cackling Culprit
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever Cackling Culprit or another creature you control dies, you gain 1 life.
{1}{B}: Cackling Culprit gains deathtouch until end of turn.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Ha! They fall for it every time!"

card_faces.name: Binding Geist
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever Binding Geist attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
Disturb {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb c ost.)

card_faces.name: Spectral Binding
card_faces.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-0.
If Spectral Binding would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card_faces.name: Soulcipher Board
card_faces.oracle_text:
Soulcipher Board enters the battlefield with three omen counters on it.
{1}{U}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard.
Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, remove an omen counter from Soulcipher Board. Then if it has no omen counters on it, transform it.

card_faces.name: Cipherbound Spirit
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Cipherbound Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
{3}{U}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
card_faces.flavor_text: Rather than consort with demons, the Quietus Cult seeks wisdom from the dead.

name: Desperate Farmer // Depraved Harvester
type_line: Creature — Human Peasant // Creature — Human Knight

card_faces.name: Desperate Farmer
card_faces.oracle_text:
Lifelink
When another creature you control dies, transform Desperate Farmer.
card_faces.flavor_text: A tragic moment pushed him to a blasphemous act.

card_faces.name: Depraved Harvester
card_faces.flavor_text: Once he'd tasted that dark power, there was no turning back.

name: Ragged Recluse // Odious Witch
type_line: Creature — Human Peasant // Creature — Human Warlock

card_faces.name: Ragged Recluse
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you discarded a card this turn, transform Ragged Recluse.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Forgive my manners. It's been so long since I had a guest for dinner."

card_faces.name: Odious Witch
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever Odious Witch attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
card_faces.flavor_text: Her cauldron refilled, she settled in to wait for the next unsuspecting traveler to knock at her door.

card_faces.name: Hookhand Mariner
card_faces.oracle_text: Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: The lcoal gossips swore Nesmith lost his hands in a fight with a werewolf.

card_faces.name: Riphook Raider
card_faces.oracle_text:
Riphook Raider can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)

name: Hopeful Initiate
oracle_text:
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
{2}{W}, Remove two +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Adamant Will
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: "I refuse to die before I see the sun rise again."

name: Estwald Shieldbasher
oracle_text: Whenever Estwald Shieldbasher attacks, you may pay {1}. If you do, it gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: The door to her home survived the fires of Malignus. Now it's her greatest weapon.

name: Fierce Retribution
oracle_text: Cleave {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
flavor_text: "It won't bring them back, but it will bring me peace."

name: Heron-Blessed Geist
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{W}, Exile Heron-Blessed Geist from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Activate only if you control an enchantment and only as a sorcery.

name: Nebelgast Beguiler
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: A moment of distraction, an hour off course.

name: Nurturing Presence
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
When Nurturing Presence enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Parish-Blade Trainee
oracle_text:
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
When Parish-Blade Trainee dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
flavor_text: The recruits trained in eternal night, fueled by the hope that they might one day see the sun again.

name: Piercing Light
oracle_text: Piercing Light deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Scry 1. (Look at the top c ard of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text:
"Creatuers of the night dissolve light shadows in the light of faith."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

name: Supernatural Rescue
oracle_text:
This spell has flash as long as you control a Spirit.
When you cast this spell, tap up to two target creatures you don't control.
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

name: Traveling Minister
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. You gain 1 life. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: Priests of Sigardian Sect travel to the farthest reaches to spread hope and healing, even in the darkest times.

name: Vampire Slayer
oracle_text: Whenever Vampire Slayer deal damage to a vampire, destroy that creature.
flavor_text: When Kaya saved her village, Berit realized even vampires could be killed. When she brought one down herself, she realized she had found her calling.

name: Alchemist's Retrieval
oracle_text:
Cleave {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Return target nonland permanent [you control] to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: To most, a terrifying apparition. To a necro-alchemist, a potent fuel source.

name: Chill of the Grave
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Zombie.
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Frozen is frozen, whether it's with cold, terror, or both.

name: Cradle of Safety
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature you control
When Cradle of Safety enters the battlefield,e ncahnted creature gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Enchanted creatures gets +1/+1.

name: Cruel Witness
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"I escaped, so why do I still feel like I'm being watched."
—Gregel, militia leader

name: Dreadlight Monstrosity
oracle_text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
{3}{U}{U}: Dreadlight Monstrosity can't be blocked this turn. Activate only if you own a card in exile.

name: Fear of Death
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Fear of Death enters the battlefield, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

name: Repository Skaab
oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Repository Skaab exploits a creature, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Created to capture the spark of genius for later use.

name: Serpentine Ambush
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a blue Serpent with base power and toughness 5/5.
flavor_text: The merchant did guarantee the new bait would bring in something big.

name: Selhoff Entomber
oracle_text: {T}, Discard a creature card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: It knows one fundamental truth: bodies belong in graves.

name: Skyward Skaab
oracle_text:
Flying
When Skyward Skaab enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"If I wanted all the parts to match, I wouldn't have become a stitcher."
—Barton, stitcher

name: Steelclad Spirit
oracle_text:
Defender
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Steelclad Spirit can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: Some geists imitate the lives they leave behind. Others follow dreams they never realized.

name: Stitched Assistant
oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Stitched Assistant exploits a creature, scry 1, then draw a card. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Syphon Essence
oracle_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: The third step in creating a skaab requires draining the body of blood and replacing it with *viscus vitae*, a mixture of angel's blood and lamp oil.

name: Wanderlight Spirit
oracle_text:
Flying
Wanderlight Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The towers and catwalks of the Voldaren fortress are lit by the lanterns of geists endlessly seeking a way out.

name: Aim fotr the Head
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Exile target Zombie.
• Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand.
flavor_text:
"Works every time."
—Halana, Kessig ranger

name: Bleed Dry
oracle_text: Target creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text:
"Wipe your chin, child. We can't have Olivia thinking we're uncivilized."
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Blood Fountain
oracle_text:
When Blood Fountain enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
{3}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blood Fountain: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Diregraf Scavenger
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Diregraf Scavenger enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If a creature card was exiled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: It can barely feel the sword anymore.

name: Doomed Dissenter
oracle_text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: The most dangerous place to be in Kessig is alone.

name: Dread Fugue
oracle_text:
Cleave {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Target player reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it [with mana value 2 or less]. That palyer discards that card.

name: Gift of Fangs
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Vampire. Otherwise, it gets -2/-2.
flavor_text:
"You are one of the few to whom we offer our blessing. What fool would reject immortality?"
—Runo Stromkirk
